headline: Shopify Inc to Join the Nasdaq-100 Index® Beginning May 19, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, May 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today announced that Shopify Inc. (Nasdaq: SHOP), will become a component of the Nasdaq-100 Index® (Nasdaq: NDX®) and the Nasdaq-100 Equal Weighted™ Index (Nasdaq: NDXE™) prior to market open on Monday, May 19, 2025. Shopify Inc. will replace MongoDB, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDB) in the Nasdaq-100 Index® and the Nasdaq-100 Equal Weighted™ Index.
